input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Christmas Tree Skirt"
Reference Product Description:
Usher in the warmth and charm of the holiday season with National Tree Company's Christmas Tree Collar. This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement. The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece. Constructed with strong polyester materials, this seasonal decoration is sturdy and durable, allowing it to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Place this adorable skirt around the base of your tree to add a festive feel to any family room or living space. At National Tree Company, we strive to create high quality Christmas decorations to help you transform your home so you can keep making every holiday moment magical.

This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement.
The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Set aside 45-60 minutes to properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories do not have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Glitzhome 22" Natural Wooden Tree Collar'
  - Name='Dyno 48" Gray and White Traditional Happy Santa Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Quilted Cream Velveteen Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Gerson International 48-in H Santa Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight Cable Knit Christmas Tree Skirt with Faux Fur Trim'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Ruffled Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='MoNiBloom Pink Velvet Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='CasaHub 48" Faux Fur Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight Scalloped Edge Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Saro Lifestyle Toscana Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Season's Designs 52In Champagne Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Vickerman 52" Green Quilt Stitch Jewel Treeskirt'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tree Skirt'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Peppermint Twist Sequined Stripes Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Saro Lifestyle Ho Ho Ho Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Season's Designs 48in Grey Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 71‚Äù Faux Fur Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Dyno 56" Gray and Black Reindeer in Forest Christmas Tree Skirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a tree collar like the reference, serving the same purpose with a different material and smaller size, so it's quite relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dyno 48" Gray and White Traditional Happy Santa Christmas Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A traditional tree skirt designed to surround the tree base like the reference, similar size and function, slightly different style and name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 48" Quilted Cream Velveteen Christmas Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product type and size, a tree skirt for decorating the Christmas tree base, differing mainly in material and color.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gerson International 48-in H Santa Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Christmas tree skirt with a holiday theme and similar dimensions, relevant though the distinctive Santa design may differ from the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Cable Knit Christmas Tree Skirt with Faux Fur Trim
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional Christmas tree skirt serving the same decorating purpose, similar size and construction focus, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a ruffled Christmas tree skirt, closely matching the reference's red ruffle skirt design, function, and decorative style, making it nearly identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MoNiBloom Pink Velvet Christmas Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A traditional velvet tree skirt similar in size and function to the reference, differing only in color and material.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A faux fur tree skirt intended to surround the tree base, closely matching the reference's function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Scalloped Edge Christmas Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A decorative tree skirt with a scalloped edge, very similar in purpose and usage to the reference product.
A Christmas tree skirt, presumably traditional in style and function, relevant though details on design are less clear.
Closely matching the size and usage of the reference as a traditional tree skirt, differing mainly in color and possibly material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 52" Green Quilt Stitch Jewel Treeskirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A quilt-stitched jewel tree skirt similar in size and function, relevant to the reference's tree skirt usage.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A themed Christmas tree skirt with holiday lettering, relevant in purpose, though with a more specific design motif.
A typical Christmas tree skirt close in size and function to the reference, differing primarily in color.
